main event: A circular bright white object was observed in the sky over Japan on May 27, 1960.
interesting points: The object was about one fourth the size of a full moon and had a tail that extended 3-4 times its diameter., The observation lasted for 2-3 seconds., The object arced slightly downward from an easterly direction before disappearing., The sighting occurred at coordinates 42°15'N 157°25'E., Another report indicated the possibility of the object being a meteor or satellite, but it was unconfirmed.
sighted object: a circular bright white object with a tail
